original_text: All the people there were worshipping the Lord. At the same time the singers were singing and the priests were making music with their trumpets. They all continued to do that until the priests finished making the burnt offering.
korean_text: 온 회중이 경배하며 노래하는 자들은 노래하고 나팔 부는 자들은 나팔을 불어 번제를 마치기까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: All the people there were worshipping the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 있는 모든 사람들이 주를 경배하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: At the same time the singers were singing
and the priests were making music with their trumpets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장들은 나팔로 음악을 연주하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They all continued to do that
until the priests finished making the burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들이 번제물을 드리는 것을 마칠 때까지
